TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Su'aci, title = Su'aci, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Su'aci} }

S.FORM: alang Su'aci ga niya mki sku Takaw Si atu Toweng Ku, kwara sali buwan nya ga 22 buwan, 84 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 88% kyan ku 74 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 12% kyan ku 10 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Bunun 30%, Rukay 7%, Cou 19%, Hla'aluwa 30%, Amis 2%. maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Su'aci hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na Su'aci hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Su'aci hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na Su'aci hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Su'aci hya' ga Kalʉvʉnga. tay 'zil na Su'aci hya' ga Rʉhlʉcʉ. rekisi kayal kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang So'aci ga niya mki sko Takaw Si ato Toweng Ko, kwara sali bowan nya ga 22 bowan, 84 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 88% kyan ko 74 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 12% kyan ko 10 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Bonon 30%, Rokay 7%, Coo 19%, Hla'alowa 30%, Amis 2%. maki qo ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na So'aci hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay 'zil na So'aci hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na So'aci hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkraya' na So'aci hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na So'aci hya' ga Kalʉvʉnga. tay 'zil na So'aci hya' ga Rʉhlʉcʉ. rekisi kayal kyokay ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
